g.text: Configure ORCA for Deep Archive in the collection
Queries for all the files related to collectionId
Creates migration job records with pending status.
Performs bulk retrieval for the files
Notify message that files have been restored sent to queue
Read messages that files have been restored
Copies files to Deep Archive storage
Update the file storage type and migration status in the database
Requests migration job status by passing jobId
Returns information relevant to the jobid
Runs reports until job is in completed state
Returns mismatch data based on storage type
Analyzes mismatch reports for storage discrepencies and resolves them
